question: ####UFAQ [Michael Boggs] If the first subroutine on Macrophage resolves and the trace is successful, but there are no virus counters hosted on cards and no cards that will be trashed from the purge effect, does the Corp still lose 2 from [Fester](/en/card/06075)?
answer: Yes. Subroutines that are not broken must resolve, even if they will not have any direct effect on the game state.
